body.raw:
{
    "username": "username_of_vcb_digital",
    "password": "password_of_vcb_digital",
    "tranfer_to": "1482597_accountnumber_to_send_money",
    "bank_code": "970416_get_from_GET",
    "amount": 1000,
    "content": "content_to_tranfer",
    "feeType": "1", // 1: sender pay || 2: receiver pay, default: "1"
    "accountNumber": "" //if need to send by special account number, default: ""
}

item.name: Tranfer money in local VCB (Chuyển tiền qua TK VCB)

body.raw:
{
    "username": "username_of_vcb_digital",
    "password": "password_of_vcb_digital",
    "tranfer_to": "1482597_accountnumber_to_send_money",
    "amount": 1000,
    "content": "content_to_tranfer",
    "feeType": "1", // 1: sender pay || 2: receiver pay, default: "1"
    "accountNumber": "" //if need to send by special account number, default: ""
}

item.name: Confirm tranfer money (Xác nhận chuyển tiền)
